scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: OjoAusana
scrape.text: Okay...so didnt hate it BUT giving it 3 stars because the entire book is like the definition of mansplain.... That and the like entire paragraph/chapter about dicks/peeing is uh super weird lmfao like i have 0 idea why that was relevant but it was pretty funny ğŸ˜‚
